body_html:
@bhack The credential information for AWS is stored in ~/.aws/credentials and is picked up by AWS C++ SDK by default (DefaultAWSCredentialsProviderChain). So the credentials will not be an issue.

The region information for AWS is optionally stored in ~/.aws/config and the region information is not part of the credentials.

For AWS C++ SDK, the region information will not be picked up, unless explicitly loaded through AWSConfigFileProfileConfigLoader (could load either ~/.aws/config or ~/.aws/credentials).
